# Resources

## Mentioned in this book

- [Master the Coding Interview: Data Structures + Algorithms](https://www.udemy.com/course/master-the-coding-interview-data-structures-algorithms/){target="_blank"}: The online course this book is based upon
- [https://github.com/RilDev/interviewgator](https://github.com/RilDev/interviewgator){target="_blank"}: The repository where this book is stored
- [repl.it](https://repl.it/){target="_blank"}: online coding environment
- [bigocheatsheet.com](https://www.bigocheatsheet.com/){target="_blank"}: Big O notation graph and common data structures operations
- [Codility's time complexity lesson](https://codility.com/media/train/1-TimeComplexity.pdf){target="_blank"}: a well put together lesson about Big O's time and space complexity

## Practice

- [Codility](https://www.codility.com/){target="_blank"}: A platform used by many tech companies like [TopTal](https://www.toptal.com/){target="_blank"} to test people applying to them
- [Hackerrank](https://www.hackerrank.com/){target="_blank"}: Another platform that companies use to test developers

## Videos

- [Interview At Google](https://youtu.be/XKu_SEDAykw){target="_blank"}: A example of how white board interviews play-out at Google.
